main event: A civilian sighted an unidentified flying object shaped like a controller in a plexiglass dome on December 6, 1957, in Tampa, Florida.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 40 feet in diameter and had an aluminum color., It was illuminated and hovered approximately 75 to 100 feet before rising steeply., The sighting lasted about 30 seconds., The report mentions the object resembled an aircraft fuselage on a flattened doughnut-shaped propeller., There was no photograph included in the report.
sighted object: unidentified flying object shaped like a controller in a plexiglass dome
